item.title: [Python] Basic pattern of if statement and usage (comparison operator and Boolean operator)
item.description: # [Python] Basic pattern of if statement and usage (comparison operator and Boolean operator) A review of the if statement pattern. ** ■ Table of contents ** Basic syntax of if statement No conditional branch Conditional branch (else only) 2 or more conditional branches (without else) Two or more conditional branches (with else) Condition expression operator List of operators Example of comparison operator “==” equal “!

item.title: Python inexperienced person try 100 knocks of language processing 00～04
item.description: [Addition] Click here for 05-06 Python inexperienced person try 100 language processing knock 05-06 https://qiita.com/earlgrey914/items/e772f1b7e5efea114e1d Click here for 07-09 Python inexperienced person try 100 knocks of language processing 07～09 https://qiita.com/earlgrey914/items/a7b6781037bc0844744b #Click here to try <Language processing 100 knocks 2015> https://repository.kulib.kyoto-u.ac.jp/dspace/handle/2433/245698 ** Author profile (important) ** No basic learning experience with Python. A level where you can copy and move the sample lying on the net. I’ve touched Java a little during university exercises.
